documentTitle: Draft Internal Strategy, Planning & Operations Document

sections.title: Weaving Strategy
sections.subtitle: Into Software.
sections.content: We identify fragmented workflows in mid-market and enterprise organizations and re-thread them into seamless, data-driven systems. We replace legacy debt with custom, owned solutions—but only after rigorous validation.

items.title: Consulting Before Coding
items.description: We are strategic partners to $1M+ revenue organizations. Code is a tool, not the product. We value impact over hours.

items.title: Validate, Then Build
items.description: We never build "speculative" products. Mockups sell the vision; engineering starts only after the contract is signed.

items.title: Data Over Intuition
items.description: We quantify the pain (e.g., "$10k/mo lost") before pitching. Research is our spearhead for acquisition.

items.label: Phase 1
items.title: Intake & Research
items.description: Anytime an idea strikes, it goes to the Backlog. Before a Sprint starts, we conduct market research to assess viability.

items.label: Week 1
items.title: Build & Prep
items.description: Monday Sprint Start: Select top backlog item. Create "Demo First" assets. Rebuild prospect's site/app as a high-fidelity mockup.

items.label: Week 2
items.title: Outreach & Execution
items.description: "I built this for you." Cold outreach with assets. Goal: Book demo meetings to validate interest.

items.label: Review
items.title: Retro & Pivot
items.description: Friday Wk 2: Analyze response data. If valid → Contract. If invalid → Kill. Decide topic for Sprint 2.
